medical_history.chief_complaint: Right flank and right upper quadrant pain with associated nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Initially, pain was colicky and localized to the right flank, lasting hours but relieved with pain medication. It became constant starting yesterday, now localized to right flank and right upper quadrant, exacerbated by food intake, leading to severe pain necessitating ambulance escort. This is the patient's first episode.
